data.message: slim shady. please stand up.. there are people that disslike is words.. maybe cause he.s not the same race as some of u are that make shit comments on is music.. but i dare bet that u used to listern to micheal jackson.. yes a good singer n dancer.. but was well known for is name when it came to children.. a name he gave is self... so em is white he raps. speaks true words.. knocks trump.. so what.. so why do people say he is crap.. cause em is white.. and tells no lies on music... but u wouldnt knock micheal jackson would u.
